item.title: Carrot Cake with Chocolate Topping
item.description:
Servings: 12 slices | Prepare Time: 10 minutes | Cooking Time: 30 minutes

Serving: 199 Cals | 29.2g carbs | 6.7g fat | 8g protein

Half a kilo Carrot Cake with Chocolate Topping.

item.title: Tools
item.description:
Stanley number 4 hand plane

Vonder double-sided diamond stone (600/1200)

Z-Saw 250mm ryoba japanese saw

Sparta L shaped square

Sparta 5 inch machinist vise

Vonder 7 counter-sink drill bit set (3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 6mm, 8mm, 10mm and 19mm)
